safetyTips: My driver wears a face mask when delivering all products. We knock on the door and step 2 metres back whilst we wait for our customer to answer. We leave the flowers on the doorstep so there is no contact.
name: SHIRKOAK FARM FLOWERS
address: Shirkoak Farm, Bethersden Road, Woodchurch, Ashford, TN26 3PZ
description: We are a florist based in Woodchurch, Ashford providing flowers for all occasions, birthdays, funerals, weddings etc. All bouquets and arrangements start at Â£30 and we will produce something big and beautiful in your colour choice. Deliveries are free within a 10 mile radius of Woodchurch. All of our flowers are delivered safely in a car or collection is possible. Order via Facebook, telephone, instagram or email.
